original_title: The Bitcoin Dilemma - The Past, Present & Future of Cryptocurrencies
overview: The Bitcoin Dilemma is a clear and conscious story of the development of the cryptocurrency industry today. Featuring interviews with key players within crypto, finance, technology, cybersecurity industries, Khan brings a highly sensitive topic to clarity. "Cryptocurrencies have received a bad name over the past decade and it's time to bring the real picture to people worldwide. We hope this clears a lot of confusion, eliminates the dilemmas behind crypto, and helps the common man or woman understand what role crypto is going to play in their lives in the future", says Khan.
title: The Bitcoin Dilemma - The Past, Present & Future of Cryptocurrencies
